mapper.insert: INSERT INTO voc_tb (phone_number, email, type, title, content, category_id, member_id, ticket_id) VALUES (#{phoneNumber}, #{email}, #{type}, #{title}, #{content}, #{categoryId}, #{memberId}, #{ticketId})
mapper.select: SELECT v.*, c.name AS category_name FROM voc_tb AS v JOIN voc_category_tb AS c ON v.category_id = c.id LEFT JOIN voc_answer_tb AS a ON v.id = a.voc_id WHERE member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY v.id DESC
